doc:
Guillermo Marín https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guillermo_Mar%C3%ADn 0 Guillermo Marín (12 August 1905 – 21 May 1988) was a classic Spanish film and theater actor. He was one of the leading men in Spanish cinema of the 1940s, and in stages in the 1950s. He played several characters in successful films directed by Edgar Neville, but eventually preferred stage before screen. Guillermo_Marín ( 12_August_1905 – 21_May_1988 ) was a_classic_Spanish_film_and_theater_actor . He was one of the_leading_men in Spanish_cinema of the_1940s , and in stages in the_1950s . He played several_characters in successful_films directed by Edgar_Neville , but eventually_preferred_stage before screen .
